Dueling.name: counterattack
Dueling.description: Quickly turn the tables on an attacker who makes a mistake.

Dueling.name: overpower
Dueling.description: Put an enemy in a compromised position.

Dueling.name: disarm
Dueling.description: Strip a foe of their weapon or take it for yourself.

Dueling.name: duel
Dueling.description: Compel a nearby creature to fight you in single combat.

Tactics.name: provoke
Tactics.description: Draw the attention of a nearby creature by taunting them.

Tactics.name: intercept
Tactics.description: Rush in to interrupt an attack on someone else.

Tactics.name: charge
Tactics.description: Violently barrel through anything in your path.

Tactics.name: retreat
Tactics.description: Provoke nearby creatures to give your allies cover to withdraw.

Tactics.name: whirlwind
Tactics.description: Become a tornado of martial fury.

Camaraderie.name: summon the blood
Camaraderie.description: Recite a poem to bolster the spirits of your friends.

Camaraderie.name: valiant soliloquy
Camaraderie.description: Give a rousing speech to your allies, inspiring them to overcome the odds.

Camaraderie.name: war story
Camaraderie.description: Earn extra AP by recounting a battle from your past adventures.

Camaraderie.name: marshal
Camaraderie.description: Organize the help of your allies to overcome a test of strength.

Camaraderie.name: bond
Camaraderie.description: Form an unbreakable partnership with one of your party members.

Leadership.name: size up
Leadership.description: Evaluate the capabilities and vulnerabilities of a nearby creature.

Leadership.name: plan
Leadership.description: Prepare your party before combat to ambush your enemies.

Leadership.name: recruit
Leadership.description: Command a nearby commoner or minion to assist you.

Leadership.name: attendant
Leadership.description: Permanently call an NPC Fighter into service as your ally and apprentice.

Body.name: technique
Body.description: Make your body as deadly as common weapons.

Body.name: flow
Body.description: Enter a state of intense focus after rolling a Triumph.

Body.name: yawp
Body.description: Make a show of bravado to frighten nearby creatures.

Body.name: focus
Body.description: You clear your mind, allowing you to surpass your normal limits.

Body.name: defy death
Body.description: If you would die from an enemy’s attack, you overcome fate to make a last stand.

Legendary.name: limit break
Legendary.description: Achieve a transcendent unity of mind and body to achieve one of three supernatural feats.

Legendary.name: champion
Legendary.description: Tales of your heroic deeds have spread widely, unlocking heroic abilities.

Legendary.name: steel pact
Legendary.description: Form a permanent, extraordinary bond with one of your weapons.

Invocation.name: declare
Invocation.description: Profess a reason for intervening in a matter, steeling your resolve.

Invocation.name: petition
Invocation.description: While regrouping, recite a petition to receive a boon.

Invocation.name: invoke
Invocation.description: Leave your worldly body behind to seek answers in a liminal plane of existence.

Invocation.name: vow
Invocation.description: Permanently bind yourself in service of an ideal.

Inquiries.name: soul gaze
Inquiries.description: You peer into the eyes of another creature to sense their ideals and flaws.

Inquiries.name: impression
Inquiries.description: You brush against a creature, feeling its desires.

Inquiries.name: evil eye
Inquiries.description: You close your eyes and sense the worst thing that ever happened nearby.

Inquiries.name: shadowseek
Inquiries.description: You project yourself into a shadow plane to seek the location of a creature or object anywhere in the omniverse.

Verdicts.name: inspire
Verdicts.description: You recite a meaningful statement, inspiring an NPC to live up to their ideal.

Verdicts.name: compel truth
Verdicts.description: You grip the mind of a nearby creature, forcing it to tell the truth.

Verdicts.name: forgive
Verdicts.description: You place a forgiving hand on a creature, relieving their conscience of guilt for a past transgression.

Verdicts.name: liberate
Verdicts.description: You channel the weight of your devotion to alleviate an NPC of a character flaw.

Wrath.name: fiery avenger
Wrath.description: You speak a phrase of power, igniting your weapon in magical flame.

Wrath.name: thunderous word
Wrath.description: You speak a word of power that releases a thunderous shockwave.

Wrath.name: lawbringer
Wrath.description: You raise your hand into the sky and summon a deadly spectral warhammer.

Wrath.name: smite
Wrath.description: You condemn a creature, engulfing it in radiant flame.

Wrath.name: blazing avenger
Wrath.description: You permanently enchant a weapon, imbuing it with incredible power.

Wards.name: shield
Wards.description: Summon a magical shield that blocks damage.

Wards.name: sigil
Wards.description: Draw a magic sigil that affects nearby creatures in various ways.

Wards.name: rebuke
Wards.description: You issue a word of power to an attacker, knocking them backward.

Wards.name: oblation
Wards.description: You place your hands on a creature and utter a loving phrase, restoring their hit points.

Wards.name: befizzle
Wards.description: You curse a creature, rendering it unable to use magic.

Legendary.name: wraith
Legendary.description: You now enter an ethereal form when at 0 HP.

Legendary.name: sacrifice
Legendary.description: You bring a creature back from the dead, at a cost to your own soul…

Legendary.name: prophecy
Legendary.description: You glimpse a creature’s fate, shaping its future.

Legendary.name: eternity gate
Legendary.description: You project yourself past all realities into the beyond to seek and find a single truth.

Story and Song.name: commune
Story and Song.description: Invent a local saying to charm information out of a commoner.

Story and Song.name: folk song
Story and Song.description: Sing a song that kindles bright, somber, or proud feelings in NPCs nearby.

Story and Song.name: speak myth
Story and Song.description: Appeal to a local myth to gain the favor of a commoner and receive a favor.

Survivalist.name: remedy
Survivalist.description: Scavenge your area to find a plant-based remedy for an ailment.

Survivalist.name: shroud
Survivalist.description: Entreat nearby flora to provide protection for the party.

Survivalist.name: signal
Survivalist.description: Summon the help of a fellow Ranger.

Survivalist.name: ritual
Survivalist.description: Scavenge for a magic edible that gives you supernatural insight.

Pathfinder.name: read the winds
Pathfinder.description: You sense weather patterns, and can predict the weather in the days ahead.

Pathfinder.name: navigate
Pathfinder.description: You can’t get lost in wilderness, and you can find a special natural reprieve in times of need.

Pathfinder.name: delve
Pathfinder.description: You sense the general layout of the next three areas in an underground structure.

Pathfinder.name: speak with trees
Pathfinder.description: You touch a tree trunk, connecting yourself to the forest. The trees come to your aid.

Hunter.name: track
Hunter.description: You can pick up on tracks left nearby and identify the type of creature that left them.

Hunter.name: farshot
Hunter.description: You sharpen your senses to make a ranged attack on a far away target.

Hunter.name: deadeye
Hunter.description: When you roll a Triumph on a ranged attack, you can neutralize an enemy’s body part.

Hunter.name: stalk
Hunter.description: You and your party can stalk tracked prey without it noticing you, setting up an ambush.

Hunter.name: nemesis
Hunter.description: You mark a specific creature you have met before as your nemesis, giving you an advantage against it.

Friend.name: speak with animal
Friend.description: You form a bond with an animal, allowing you to interpret its thoughts and feelings.

Friend.name: animal partner
Friend.description: You bond with a nearby animal who becomes your companion and follows your instructions.

Friend.name: courier
Friend.description: You recruit a nearby animal and send it on a mission to deliver an item.

Friend.name: pair bond
Friend.description: You develop a telepathic bond with your animal partner, allowing you to enter a trance and take over its body.

Friend.name: whisper on the wind
Friend.description: You whisper a message carried by the wind, summoning a flying animal to come to your aid.

Legendary.name: wild celebrity
Legendary.description: Wild animals everywhere now sense you as an ally and will not attack you.

Legendary.name: slayer
Legendary.description: You devastate a group of minions in an impressive acrobatic fashion, reducing their numbers by half.

Legendary.name: friend of the land
Legendary.description: You become the friend of a wilderness region, gaining the control of a natural fortress.

Shapeshifter.name: animal form
Shapeshifter.description: You take the form of a wild animal, adopting its shape, senses, and range of motion.

Shapeshifter.name: gills
Shapeshifter.description: You enchant nearby creatures, allowing them to breathe underwater.

Shapeshifter.name: steelsprout
Shapeshifter.description: You turn a nearby metal object into a weave of delicate plants.

Shapeshifter.name: petrify
Shapeshifter.description: You turn the surface of a creature to stone, or encase your own body with a protective shell.

Shapeshifter.name: shapeshift
Shapeshifter.description: A superior version of your Animal Form spell that allows you to become a more powerful animal.

Summoner.name: thorn
Summoner.description: You conjure a poisonous thorn and shoot it toward a nearby target.

Summoner.name: wild font
Summoner.description: You touch a container holding food, water, or oil, causing it to spill an excess of its contents.

Summoner.name: evening star
Summoner.description: You summon a wisp of light in the sky, casting daylight on a huge area.

Summoner.name: aurora
Summoner.description: You conjure a dazzling prismatic aurora in the sky that dazzles creatures up to a kilometer away.

Summoner.name: echoes of creation
Summoner.description: You summon a coterie of magical wisps that restore the hit points of all creatures in your scene.

Elementalist.name: freeze
Elementalist.description: You blow cool air, creating freezing winds that swirl around a nearby target.

Elementalist.name: burn
Elementalist.description: You blow hot air, creating scorching winds that can ignite a target in flame nearby.

Elementalist.name: shock
Elementalist.description: You call down a bolt of lightning from the sky to strike a target you can see.

Elementalist.name: fireball
Elementalist.description: You shape an orb of fire and send it streaking toward a target, where it creates a devastating explosion.

Stormcaller.name: cloudcall
Stormcaller.description: You create a thick fog that rapidly expands around you, concealing the area.

Stormcaller.name: vortex
Stormcaller.description: You create a howling vortex in a body of liquid nearby that can suck in objects and creatures.

Stormcaller.name: gale
Stormcaller.description: You create a ferocious windstorm that kicks up dust and small objects and obscures vision.

Stormcaller.name: riverfury
Stormcaller.description: You whisper a magical incantation to a nearby river, calling forth a torrent of water from upstream.

Stormcaller.name: stormcall
Stormcaller.description: You produce a terrifying storm whose effects you can control while it is active.

Spiritcaller.name: wild aspect
Spiritcaller.description: You harness the aspect of one of three wild creatures, gaining heightened physical capabilities.

Spiritcaller.name: prey sense
Spiritcaller.description: You sharpen your senses and can feel a subtle signal when danger is near.

Spiritcaller.name: nature's watch
Spiritcaller.description: You extend your senses far beyond your normal capabilities, allowing you to detect the hidden and unreal.

Ecologist.name: command nature
Ecologist.description: You recite a brief poem to the plants around you, causing them to produce an effect.

Ecologist.name: memories of stone
Ecologist.description: You channel the ancient wisdom of a stone monument, learning important information about your world.

Ecologist.name: shift season
Ecologist.description: You manipulate the elements to change the current season everywhere within one kilometer of you.

Legendary.name: nature's wrath
Legendary.description: You channel elemental fury, creating one of three natural disasters with an enormous impact on the environment.

Legendary.name: wild evolution
Legendary.description: Your physical essence becomes permanently intertwined with a chosen animal’s form, allowing you to shapeshift at will.

Legendary.name: to dust
Legendary.description: You sacrifice yourself to become the seed for a new world, creating life across a planet.

Legendary.name: world wish
Legendary.description: You return a crafted object to nature, instantly reducing it to dust.

Healing.name: mend
Healing.description: You gently touch a creature, immediately restoring hit points and mending minor wounds.

Healing.name: relieve
Healing.description: You say something comforting, relieving a creature of anxiety, pain, and discomfort.

Healing.name: heal
Healing.description: You embrace a creature, restoring all of its hit points and curing it of short-term impairments.

Healing.name: restore
Healing.description: You touch a creature, completely restoring it to its normal state.

Alteration.name: sleep
Alteration.description: You whisper a brief lullaby, putting any number of nearby commoners to sleep for an hour.

Alteration.name: calcify
Alteration.description: You touch a creature, causing its surface to harden and resist damage.

Alteration.name: feign death
Alteration.description: You place nearby creatures in suspended animation for up to an hour.

Alteration.name: reshape
Alteration.description: You reshape the facial appearance of a creature, making them look older, younger, or like a completely different person.

Alteration.name: lifelink
Alteration.description: You entwine the life-force of two creatures, tying their fates together.

Necromancy.name: deathsense
Necromancy.description: You sense whether any spirit creatures are nearby, and can extend your vision to see them.

Necromancy.name: commune with the dead
Necromancy.description: You reach beyond the living to speak to the dead nearby.

Necromancy.name: reanimate
Necromancy.description: You animate a nearby corpse or skeleton, making it your minion.

Necromancy.name: reinstate the dead
Necromancy.description: You touch a living creature and make it the host for a nearby spirit creature.

Harm.name: corrupt
Harm.description: You grip a creature and create a necrotizing wound in its flesh.

Harm.name: nox
Harm.description: You give a creature a combination of deleterious effects for the next hour.

Harm.name: afflict
Harm.description: You curse a creature with an affliction that lasts for up to one month.

Harm.name: wither
Harm.description: You cause a creature’s body to wither, giving them the experience of advanced age without changing their lifespan.

Harm.name: heartkill
Harm.description: You curse the heart of a creature, causing it to explode, or turning it into a time bomb.

Perception.name: modulate
Perception.description: You alter the nature and intensity of a creature’s physical sensations for up to an hour.

Perception.name: shape senses
Perception.description: You manipulate a creature’s perception of the world for up to a day.

Perception.name: false sense
Perception.description: You cause a creature to perceive a specific thing or a category of things falsely.

Perception.name: forget
Perception.description: You touch a creature, erasing its memory for the previous month… or beyond.

Examination.name: examine the dead
Examination.description: You evaluate a corpse to diagnose its cause of death.

Examination.name: diagnose
Examination.description: You touch a creature to discover its mysterious affliction.

Examination.name: curious case
Examination.description: You examine a scene for familiar clues.

Legendary.name: genesis command
Legendary.description: You reverse or accelerate a creature’s development, like reverting an adult into a child.

Legendary.name: banish
Legendary.description: You banish a spirit creature to a random shadow plane.

Legendary.name: eternal slumber
Legendary.description: You place a creature into a permanent and peaceful sleep.

Legendary.name: the bitter gift
Legendary.description: You bestow a creature with self-awareness, turning it into a person like you.

Charisma.name: cosmopolitan
Charisma.description: Invent a local mannerism to fool commoners about your identity.

Charisma.name: silver tongue
Charisma.description: Use quick thinking and charm to evade suspicion.

Charisma.name: don't you know who i am?
Charisma.description: Enlist your party members to establish a fantastical ruse about your identity.

Termination.name: sneak attack
Termination.description: Make a quick attack on a foe who is distracted.

Termination.name: poison
Termination.description: Combine basic goods from a general store to create one of five poisons.

Termination.name: death hand
Termination.description: A magic, single-shot hand cannon that uses a silent magic charge to shoot a slug.

Termination.name: bounty
Termination.description: Enlist bounty hunters to pursue and capture or kill a marked target.

Concealment.name: strap
Concealment.description: Conceal up to two weapons in your clothing without being noticed.

Concealment.name: disguise
Concealment.description: Use found objects nearby to create a convincing disguise.

Concealment.name: blink pack
Concealment.description: A magical messenger pack with a hidden switch that conceals items.

Concealment.name: needful hilt
Concealment.description: A magic hilt that can morph into a weapon that you imagine when needed.

Concealment.name: shadow
Concealment.description: A magic cape that makes everything but your shadow invisible.

Surveillance.name: tracker
Surveillance.description: A magic compass and tag that allows you to track something you put the tag on.

Surveillance.name: spyglasses
Surveillance.description: Magic eyeglasses that let you see in the dark and can be upgraded with additional capabilities.

Surveillance.name: cloner
Surveillance.description: A magic amulet that allows you to eavesdrop on a communications device.

Surveillance.name: seeker
Surveillance.description: A levitating orb that can scout adjacent rooms for you.

Stenography.name: dossier
Stenography.description: A magic book that you can use to copy documents.

Stenography.name: mimic
Stenography.description: A magic pen that guides your hand to create forgeries.

Stenography.name: listener
Stenography.description: A magic gem that can be activated to record sounds nearby.

Stenography.name: crypto
Stenography.description: A magic ring that can translate languages and decode secret messages.

Infiltration.name: feather hook
Infiltration.description: A magical grappling hook that gently glides itself upward like a balloon.

Infiltration.name: bricolage
Infiltration.description: Improvise one of four useful devices using everyday objects nearby.

Infiltration.name: needful key
Infiltration.description: A magic key that can morph to fit a lock.

Infiltration.name: blueprint
Infiltration.description: A magic folio that can reveal the floorplan of a building when pressed on one of its walls.

Impersonation.name: persona
Impersonation.description: You can carefully prepare a convincing alternate identity. You can create the persona of a commoner, an officer, or an aristocrat.

Legendary.name: shadow cutter
Legendary.description: A wearable magic bracelet that can be stretched to create a hole in solid objects.

Legendary.name: the artifice
Legendary.description: A small mask that projects an illusion, transforming your image and voice.

Legendary.name: nightcrawler
Legendary.description: Infiltrate a person’s office, encampment, or home to discover sensitive information about them.

Misdirection.name: magic tricks
Misdirection.description: Produce a tiny magical effect to surprise, delight, or confuse those around you.

Misdirection.name: mesmerize
Misdirection.description: Dazzle a nearby creature with an optical illusion.

Misdirection.name: overthere
Misdirection.description: Make a suggestive gesture, redirecting a hostile creature’s attention.

Misdirection.name: mirage
Misdirection.description: Conjure a major illusion that can be programmed with looping mechanics.

Misdirection.name: invisibility
Misdirection.description: Make a creature or object invisible.

Mannequins.name: splitting image
Mannequins.description: Create illusory duplicates to confuse others.

Mannequins.name: phantom menace
Mannequins.description: Create an illusion of an incredibly annoying creature.

Mannequins.name: illusory creature
Mannequins.description: Design and conjure an illusory creature.

Clairvoyance.name: magic eye
Clairvoyance.description: You briefly gain the ability to see beyond physical reality.

Clairvoyance.name: whisper
Clairvoyance.description: You telepathically send a message to a nearby creature, or open a link with them for a conversation.

Clairvoyance.name: message
Clairvoyance.description: You open a telepathic communication link with a creature, even if you don’t know where they are.

Clairvoyance.name: interpret
Clairvoyance.description: You enter the mind of a nearby creature and learn their language.

Clairvoyance.name: insight
Clairvoyance.description: You gaze into the mind of a creature, learning their most prominent intention.

Conjuration.name: little bird
Conjuration.description: You summon an illusory bird that keeps watch over an area.

Conjuration.name: helen's fantastic feast
Conjuration.description: Summon an elaborate feast that restores the hit points of your guests.

Conjuration.name: monitor
Conjuration.description: Summon a small illusory servant that you can direct to scout ahead of you.

Conjuration.name: shadow haven
Conjuration.description: Create a secret dwelling in a shadow plane that only you and your friends can access.

Mind Control.name: bamboozle
Mind Control.description: Make a creature mildly confused about a specific subject.

Mind Control.name: wren's delightful dream
Mind Control.description: Give a creature a deeply comforting dream that makes them feel beloved and forgiving.

Mind Control.name: perky profanation
Mind Control.description: Curse a nearby creature to behave absurdly.

Mind Control.name: fear
Mind Control.description: Breach the mind of a creature to haunt them with their worst fear.

Mayhem.name: scintillate
Mayhem.description: Launch a streaking bolt of sparks to harm an enemy or create a harmless firework.

Mayhem.name: bedazzle
Mayhem.description: Summon prismatic bolts that can impale and dazzle enemies.

Mayhem.name: loosen
Mayhem.description: Create a cascading wave of magic mischief that loosens things that are fastened or tightened.

Mayhem.name: chaos ball
Mayhem.description: Summon a small elastic ball that bounces chaotically, shattering small and fragile objects.

Legendary.name: peerless pilot
Legendary.description: Conjure a fantastic hot air balloon from another dimension.

Legendary.name: control
Legendary.description: Dominate the mind of a nearby creature, taking complete control of them.

Legendary.name: perfect gift
Legendary.description: Glimpse the mind of a creature to summon an emotionally priceless gift for them.

Legendary.name: invasion
Legendary.description: Enter the dream of a creature to implant an idea in their mind.

Evocation.name: magic strike
Evocation.description: Shoot a shimmering missile of force from your wand or staff.

Evocation.name: kindle
Evocation.description: Rub your hands together, igniting a target on fire.

Evocation.name: clap
Evocation.description: Create a thunderous wave of force by clapping your hands.

Evocation.name: telekinesis
Evocation.description: Move a nearby creature or object using only your mind.

Evocation.name: last light
Evocation.description: Channel a blinding beam of light at a target that ignites flammable objects and can melt steel.

Conjuration.name: familiar
Conjuration.description: You summon a tiny spectral creature who becomes your ally.

Conjuration.name: pegasus cloak
Conjuration.description: Bestow yourself and nearby creatures with an illusory cloak that allows them to levitate.

Conjuration.name: force field
Conjuration.description: Create a paper-thin wall of force that can stop objects from passing through.

Conjuration.name: conjure
Conjuration.description: Imagine an object, causing it to appear nearby.

Planeshifting.name: gate
Planeshifting.description: Teleport back to a special place you have bound yourself to.

Planeshifting.name: portal
Planeshifting.description: Conjure a series of portals that are linked to one another.

Planeshifting.name: dark door
Planeshifting.description: Knock on a door, making it a temporary portal to a shadow plane.

Planeshifting.name: teleport
Planeshifting.description: Snap your fingers, teleporting to any place you choose.

Magecraft.name: no
Magecraft.description: Neutralize a spell that another creature is casting.

Magecraft.name: reflect
Magecraft.description: Produce a counterspell that reflects a spell another creature is casting.

Magecraft.name: enscroll
Magecraft.description: Create a Spell Scroll that contains a spell you know.

Magecraft.name: spellsteal
Magecraft.description: Glimpse a creature’s mind to learn a spell you have observed them casting.

Projection.name: sense magic
Projection.description: Get a tingling feeling in your bones when you’re near magic, and discern its nature.

Projection.name: aura's silvery broadcast
Projection.description: Broadcast a message up to 20 words in length to every creature within one kilometer.

Projection.name: scry
Projection.description: Flash forward in time to glimpse your actions in the near future.

Projection.name: see
Projection.description: See through all magical deceptions for the next hour.

Projection.name: find
Projection.description: Discover the location of an object you have held before, and teleport it to your location.

Trickery.name: speak
Trickery.description: Speak silently into the mind of a nearby creature.

Trickery.name: pinch
Trickery.description: Briefly imbue your fingers with supernatural strength.

Trickery.name: stretch
Trickery.description: Enlarge or shrink a nearby creature or object by up to twice or half its size.

Trickery.name: undo
Trickery.description: Speak a word of power, reversing the fate of a nearby object.

Legendary.name: rift
Legendary.description: Summon a magnificent gateway that contains a portal to The Rift.

Legendary.name: transcendence
Legendary.description: Embark on an incredible quest for knowledge that expands your consciousness far beyond yourself.

Legendary.name: planecraft
Legendary.description: Conjure a shadow plane and fill it with anything you can imagine.

Legendary.name: create
Legendary.description: Tap raw magic, converting its energy into a perfectly-crafted object that is real in every way.
